fields.description: Current forecast and historical rains indicate plant now.
Both current forecast historical rains have good signal to plant.
Historical rains signal time to plant and forecast has positive signal.
Weak planting signal - could plant some of your land.
Watch -  there are some signals looking more positive for rains arrival.
Watch - some early signals that rains may be coming soon.

fields.identifier: Do NOT plant, out of season rain Tier 4a
fields.description: Rain in forecast but history would suggest not yet time to plant.
Wait for more positive forecast.
Plant now because the signs shows there may be enough rain, and the soil may have enough water to support good germination.
fields.description_sw: Panda sasa kwa sababu dalili zinaonyesha uwezekano wa kuwa na mvua ya kutosha na udongo kuwa na maji ya kutosha kuwezesha mbegu kumea vizuri.

fields.description: Plant now because the signs shows there may be enough rain, and the soil may have enough water to support good germination.
fields.description_sw: Panda sasa kwa sababu dalili zinaonyesha uwezekano wa kuwa na mvua ya kutosha na udongo kuwa na maji ya kutosha kuwezesha mbegu kumea vizuri.

fields.description: Plant now because the signs shows there may be enough rain, and the soil may have enough water to support good germination.
fields.description_sw: Panda sasa kwa sababu dalili zinaonyesha uwezekano wa kuwa na mvua ya kutosha na udongo kuwa na maji ya kutosha kuwezesha mbegu kumea vizuri.

fields.description: Plant now if your soil is damp. Consider planting crops that can germinate when there is little rain.
fields.description_sw: Panda sasa iwapo udongo una unyevunyevu. Zingatia upanzi wa mimea inayoweza kumea kukiwa na mvua chache.

fields.identifier: KALRO 2025 A-Do NOT plant, WATCH Tier 3a
fields.description: Delay planting until the rains are steady. Prepare land, get inputs ready and wait for weekly updates.
fields.description_sw: Kawia kupanda mimea hadi mvua iwe ya kutosha.  Endelea kutayarisha shamba, weka tayari mbegu na mbolea huku ukisubiri kujulishwa kila wiki.

fields.identifier: KALRO 2025 A-Do NOT plant, WATCH Tier 3b
fields.description: Delay planting until the rains are steady. Prepare land, get inputs ready and wait for weekly updates.
fields.description_sw: Kawia kupanda mimea hadi mvua iwe ya kutosha.  Endelea kutayarisha shamba, weka tayari mbegu na mbolea huku ukisubiri kujulishwa kila wiki.

fields.identifier: KALRO 2025 A-Do NOT plant, out of season rain Tier 4a
fields.description: Delay planting. Not enough rain for germination. Prepare land, get inputs ready and wait for weekly updates.
fields.description_sw: Kawia kupanda.Hakuna mvua ya kutosha kuwezesha mbegu kumea. Tayarisha shamba, weka tayari mbegu na mbolea huku ukisubiri kujulishwa kila wiki.

fields.description: Delay planting. Not enough rain for germination. Prepare land, get inputs ready and wait for weekly updates.
